text: JENNIFER Lopez has been fuelling rumours that she's engaged to baseball legend Alex Rodriguez in recent months. The megastar has been pictured several times flashing a diamond sparkler on her wedding ring finger but is the A - List couple engaged and how long have they been dating? Here's the lowdown... Instagram 3 Jennifer Lopez shared photos from her birthday and was spotted with the ginormous sparkler Is Jennifer Lopez engaged to Alex Rodriguez? In July 2018, Jennifer Lopez sparked rumours she was engaged to Alex Rodriguez after sporting a Cartier ring on her wedding finger. The couple is currently on holiday with the rest of J - Lo's family in the Bahamas for her 49th birthday. This is not the first time the pair have sparked rumours about a potential engagement as earlier this month
